0.2.name: wordpress/blogshotr
0.2.description:
BlogShotR is a very easy useable plugin, wich helps you after activating to show the commentators Blog or Homepage with a very mini Screenshot right in the comments. It is like the easygravatars plugin and very easy to use. You can set with and hight of the Shot at admin interface

Localization

  • English * Author: Ahmet Topal
